title: Projektledare med testfokus för innovativt IT-projekt
description:
Om företaget
  
Avaron AB är ett väletablerat konsultbolag som hjälper organisationer att utveckla och implementera framgångsrika IT-lösningar. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att matcha rätt kompetens med rätt uppdrag och lägger stor vikt vid att stötta våra konsulter genom hela uppdragstiden. Vår ambition är att skapa värde både för kunder och medarbetare genom ett professionellt och personligt arbetssätt.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
I rollen som konsult hos Avaron AB blir du en nyckelperson i ett större, affärskritiskt IT-projekt hos en av våra kunder. Du kommer att:
  
Planera, samordna och genomföra tester av olika IT-system och processer.
  
Ta fram testplaner, testa nya funktioner samt följa upp och rapportera testresultat.
  
Arbeta i nära samarbete med testare, experter och andra intressenter för att säkerställa att testerna genomförs korrekt och i tid.
  
Använda och utveckla testverktyg, metoder och testfall i enlighet med projektets behov.
  
Driva incidenthantering tillsammans med leverantörer och övriga projektmedlemmar.
  
Hålla dig uppdaterad och synkroniserad med övriga delar av projektet för att säkerställa ett smidigt arbetsflöde.
  
  

Det är ett mångfacetterat testuppdrag där du bland annat kommer att hantera funktionella tester, prestandatester, säkerhetstester, datamigreringstester, integrations- och E2E-tester, användartester (UAT), regressionstester, samt eventuella kompletterande testtyper.
  
Kvalifikationer (Ska-krav)
  
Dokumenterad erfarenhet av testledning i IT-implementeringsprojekt.
  
Erfarenhet av att planera, förbereda och genomföra testplaner.
  
God kunskap om testmetoder och testverktyg.
  
Allmän projektledarkompetens.
  
Flytande engelska i tal och skrift.
  
  

Meriterande (Bra att ha)
  
Vana vid att hantera olika intressenter och god förmåga att kommunicera tydligt.
  
Strukturerat arbetssätt och förmåga att organisera komplexa arbetsuppgifter.
  
Problemlösningsförmåga och flexibilitet i en snabbt föränderlig miljö.
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta i hybridmiljöer eller internationella projekt.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Skicka därför in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
  
Mejla ditt personliga brev och CV till jobb@avaron.se och märk mejlet med:
  
”Projektledare med testfokus för innovativt IT-projekt (12750)”.
  
Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Erfaren IT/OT-säkerhetsexpert för tekniskt uppdrag
description:
Om företaget
  
Avaron AB är ett konsultbolag som samarbetar med både privata och offentliga aktörer inom olika branscher. Vår mission är att erbjuda expertis och engagerade konsulter som hjälper våra kunder att utveckla och förbättra sin verksamhet. Hos oss får du chansen att växa i rollen som specialist och samtidigt bidra till spännande projekt hos våra uppdragsgivare.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
I denna roll kommer du, som konsult hos en av våra kunder, att arbeta praktiskt med att implementera och konfigurera säkerhetslösningar i Linux-miljö. Du deltar i krav- och designarbete för att säkerställa att system och produkter uppfyller de höga säkerhetskrav som ställs på IT/OT-infrastrukturen.
  
  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**  

Konfiguration och härdning av Linux-system (till exempel RHEL) enligt etablerade riktlinjer.
  
Genomföra och dokumentera sårbarhets- och avvikelseanalyser.
  
Säkerställa att systemen följer gällande bestämmelser och standarder för IT-säkerhet.
  
Dokumentera systemarkitektur och relevanta säkerhetsaspekter.
  
Arbeta med konfiguration av signalskydd, PKI och aktiva kort i enlighet med krav från berörda myndigheter.
  
  

Kvalifikationer (Ska-krav)
  
Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Linux (till exempel RHEL).
  
Kunskap och praktisk erfarenhet av att härda IT-system, exempelvis enligt CIS Level 2.
  
Förståelse för IT-säkerhetskrav såsom KSF 3.1 eller motsvarande.
  
Godkänd säkerhetsprövning i säkerhetsklass 2 (alternativt förutsättningar att uppnå detta).
  
  

Meriterande (Bra att ha)
  
Erfarenhet av konfiguration av signalskyddssystem (KrAPI, PKI, aktiva kort).
  
Vana vid att dokumentera systemarkitektur och säkerhetsrelaterade processer.
  
Tidigare arbete med sårbarhets- och avvikelseanalyser.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Våra tjänster kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, då vi hanterar ansökningarna löpande. Vi rekommenderar dig därför att söka så snart som möjligt.
  
  

**Gör så här för att ansöka:**  

Skicka ett mejl till jobb@avaron.se.
  
Bifoga ditt personliga brev och CV.
  
Märk mejlet med ”Erfaren IT/OT-säkerhetsexpert för tekniskt uppdrag (ID 12755)” i ämnesraden.
  
  

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Erfaren testspecialist för avancerade system
description:
Om företaget
  
Avaron AB är ett konsultföretag som erbjuder spetskompetens inom IT och teknik. Vi har erfarna konsulter som hjälper företag och organisationer att stärka sin verksamhet med smarta, kreativa lösningar. Avaron AB präglas av en inkluderande kultur där nyfikenhet, kvalitet och långsiktig utveckling står i fokus.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
Just nu söker vi en senior testare för ett konsultuppdrag hos en av våra kunder. Rollen innebär att du får arbeta med testning av ett avancerat ledningssystem som används i marina miljöer. Du kommer att:
  
Gå igenom systemkrav och säkerställa att de är testbara och korrekta
  
Ta fram detaljerade testspecifikationer och planera testning
  
Utföra manuella tester samt dokumentera resultat och avvikelser
  
Arbeta nära projektets övriga deltagare för att driva förbättringar
  
Prioritera testfall och riskbedöma systemdelar
  
Genomföra godkännandetester tillsammans med kunden, vilket kan innebära resor
  
  

Du kommer att ingå i ett team av erfarna testare men också ha mycket samarbete med kollegor i olika roller.
  
Kvalifikationer (Ska-krav)
  
Minst 8 års erfarenhet av mjukvarutestning
  
Relevant IT-utbildning på högskolenivå (t.ex. datavetenskap eller teknisk inriktning)
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
  
Möjlighet att genomgå och godkännas i en säkerhetsprövning enligt gällande bestämmelser
  
  

Meriterande (Bra att ha)
  
Erfarenhet av ledningssystem för marina tillämpningar
  
Vana att arbeta i JIRA och Confluence
  
Erfarenhet av DOORS eller andra kravhanteringsverktyg
  
  

Ansökan
  
Skicka ditt personliga brev och CV via e-post till jobb@avaron.se. Märk mejlet med ”Erfaren testspecialist för avancerade system (12756)”. Vi ser fram emot att läsa din ansökan!

title: D365 Platform Architect Lead at Oatly
description:
**WHY OATLY?**
--------------


Across the world people’s consumption habits and diets are evolving to be more plant-based. Enter Oatly, the #1 oat based dairy alternative producer in the world with products spanning multiple categories.


We’re determined on being part of the discussion on the long-term future of the food and beverage industry. To keep this movement going, we need more brilliant minds to come work with us to keep the momentum going and the Oatly flowing.


Our sole purpose as a company is to make it easy for people to turn what they eat and drink into personal moments of healthy joy without recklessly taxing the planet’s resources in the process.


Sustainability, nutritional health and trust are at the heart of what we do. We are building a culture that constantly upgrades each other so we can upgrade the planet. This is a company that shows great respect and a fearless approach to make positive change. Does this feel exciting? Well, this is where you come in.

#### **WHAT WE NEED YOU TO DO**


The purpose of this role as D365 Platform Architect Lead is to be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable, high-performance Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions. This role involves working closely with business stakeholders, technical teams, and external vendors to deliver innovative solutions that streamline business processes and enhance productivity. The D365 Platform Architect Lead will provide strategic direction, technical expertise, and leadership in the development and integration of D365 and related technologies. This role will directly influence our technology strategy and the achievement of our business goals.

###### **Here’s the main elements of the role...**

* Provide expertise in business planning, roadmaps, feasibility studies, and design workshops. Define and enforce architectural standards while leading projects to meet both functional and non-functional requirements.
* Oversee governance and administration of D365, ensuring SOX compliance, strong internal controls for financial data, and accurate financial reporting.
* Develop integration strategies for D365, ensuring data consistency and resolving performance bottlenecks to optimize system efficiency.
* Collaborate with stakeholders (Columbus, SPS, Fujitsu, BI, integrations) to align solutions and ensure seamless integration. Work closely with the Lead Architect on architectural strategy and actively participate in AEB meetings and networks.
* Engage with the user community, creating and sharing resources to support and guide them. Conduct training sessions and provide ongoing assistance to empower users.
* Leverage FMCG and manufacturing expertise to design solutions tailored to the dynamic needs of a fast-moving consumer goods company. Stay informed on industry trends and developments.
* Ensure solutions meet or exceed SLAs and performance metrics, monitoring compliance and implementing corrective actions when needed. Maintain up-to-date architecture and solution details in ADOIT to reflect the latest changes.




But, you know. These are just the things we can think of right now! This might be the job today, but tomorrow brings more change, so being light on your feet and willing to embrace the unknown is a verrrrrry big help.


In this role, you will report into Business Solution & Delivery Director and the location for this role is Malmö HQ.

#### **WHAT WE NEED YOU TO BRING TO THE TABLE**


We are looking for someone with at least 10 years of experience in architecture and the broader IT industry. You have a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, along with at least 5 years of experience in documenting and managing domain architecture responsibilities. You also have extensive experience with D365 and related technologies.


You have worked on developing and implementing automation strategies and roadmaps and are skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams and managing relationships with external service providers.

**Other key competencies and experience:**

  

* Certifications in relevant technologies (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 + Power Platform Solution Architect Expert).
* Experience in the FMCG industry and an understanding of manufacturing processes.

  

#### **WHO** **WE NEED YOU TO BE**

###### **We think your oatsomeness is built upoWHO WE NEED YOU TO BEn the following qualities:**

* You have problem-solving skills essential for identifying root causes and implementing effective solutions.
* You are business-oriented and tech-savvy, with a background in solution architecture and automation with a pragmatic and persistent way of work.
* You are highly collaborative and understand that our success as a company depends on our ability to work together to find innovative solutions.
* You have a visionary leadership with a strong business mindset, with the know-how to create forward momentum and the stamina to relentlessly drive the process.
* You have the ability to drive digital transformation and foster a high-performance culture, energized by the challenge of building something lasting that benefits both the world and its people.


To be the perfect fit for Oatly, we believe you have a thirst for knowledge and are a result-driven person with high integrity. You thrive with a hands-on approach, even in times of rapid change. Your social competence allows you to work effectively both independently and collaboratively.


Finally, we hope that you share our values and have a great interest to carry out our mission in order to make the world a little bit better.

#### **YOUR APPLICATION**

**Phew! Well done if you’ve got this far. We’re glad we’ve still got your attention because we’ve got one last super important point to make.**

  

As you can probably tell, we’re a norm-breaking company. For us, diversity and differences are an obvious asset. We know that amazing candidates can sometimes be put off applying for a job unless they can tick every box, and that makes us really sad. So please trust your gut and pop in your application if it’s feeling right. If you have the curiosity, passion, and collaborative spirit, let’s do this together! It will be fun!

*Last day of application: 16th of March.*

*We treat all candidates equally: If you are interested, please apply through our application system - any correspondence should come from there. This will ensure that the candidate experience is smooth and fair to everyone!*

###### **THE OATLY WAY**


Oatly is a company built on the idea of change. Our mission is to make it easy for people to eat better and live healthier lives without recklessly taxing the planet’s resources. It's why we come to work every day. With head office in Malmö and production in Sweden, Netherlands, China, Singapore, and the US, our products are available in almost 30 countries across Europe, North America, and Asia.

*Love Oatly xxx*


 #LI-TA1

title: Senior Klienttekniker
description:
Vi söker nu en Senior Klienttekniker med minst 5 års erfarenhet för ett konsultuppdrag hos kund inom offentlig sektor. I denna roll kommer du att arbeta med avancerad klientdrift, automatisering och support i en säkerhetsfokuserad miljö med höga krav på tillförlitlighet och regelefterlevnad.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Ansvara för utrullning och förvaltning av säkerhetsuppdateringar och applikationer till klientmiljön
* Utveckla och optimera image-hantering i MDT (Microsoft Deployment Toolkit) för effektiva klientutrullningar
* Designa och implementera Windows-klientkonfigurationer enligt organisationens säkerhetsbaselines
* Leda arbetet med Group Policy-utformning och säkerhetsinställningar för klientmiljön
* Certifiera och godkänna nya datormodeller för implementering i verksamheten
* Utföra avancerad felsökning och lösa komplexa tekniska problem i klientmiljön
* Utveckla robusta automatiseringslösningar i PowerShell för effektivisering av klienthantering
* Upprätta och underhålla teknisk dokumentation för klientrelaterade processer och lösningar
* Agera teknisk rådgivare vid större infrastrukturförändringar som påverkar klientmiljön


 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med klientdrift och hantering av Windows-miljöer
* Omfattande kunskap om Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) och avancerade TaskSequences
* Gedigen erfarenhet av Configuration Manager (SCCM/ConfigMgr) för storskalig klienthantering
* Djupgående praktisk erfarenhet av Group Policy-administration och säkerhetskonfiguration
* Omfattande kunskap om Active Directory och avancerad användarhantering
* Beprövad erfarenhet av PowerShell-utveckling för automatisering av komplexa klientrelaterade processer
* Fördjupad förståelse för säkerhetskrav, compliancekrav och säkerhetsbaselines i klientmiljöer
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av proaktiv problemhantering och systematisk felsökning
* Utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska


 Det är meriterande om du har
   

  

* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Intune och moderna managementmetoder för Windows-klienter
* Kunskap om VDI-hantering (Virtual Desktop Infrastructure) och fjärrarbetslösningar
* Erfarenhet av att leda eller koordinera tekniska klientprojekt
* Relevant arbetslivserfarenhet från offentlig sektor eller annan verksamhet med höga säkerhetskrav
* Kunskaper om Mac OS och/eller Linux för hantering av heterogena klientmiljöer
* Microsoft-certifieringar
* Erfarenhet av hybrid moln/on-premise-lösningar för klienthantering


 Som person är du
   

  

* Analytisk och strukturerad med ett metodiskt och noggrant arbetssätt
* Proaktiv och strategiskt tänkande vid implementering av nya lösningar
* Självgående och ansvarstagande med förmåga att driva egna tekniska initiativ
* Lösningsorienterad och uthållig vid komplexa tekniska utmaningar
* Flexibel och stresstålig även under perioder med hög arbetsbelastning
* Pedagogisk med förmåga att kommunicera tekniska lösningar till olika målgrupper


 Som konsult hos Liminity får du
   

  

* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter och certifieringar
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och attraktiva förmåner
* Läs mer om våra förmåner på https://handbok.liminity.se


 Känns detta som rätt utmaning för dig? Ansök idag och bli en del av Liminity - framtidens IT-konsultbolag!

title: Cloud- och Infrastrukturspecialist
description:
Vi söker nu en erfaren Cloud- och Infrastrukturspecialist för ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder inom finanssektorn. Som specialist kommer du att underhålla moderna molnlösningar.
   

  

 Primära arbetsuppgifter och ansvar
   

  

* Designa, implementera och underhålla molnbaserade infrastrukturlösningar primärt i Azure och AWS
* Ansvara för migrering av befintliga system till molnplattformar enligt best practices
* Utveckla och underhålla infrastruktur som kod (IaC) med verktyg som Terraform, ARM-templates eller CloudFormation
* Implementera säkra och skalbara molnlösningar samt övervaka prestanda och tillgänglighet
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa en optimal integrering mellan infrastruktur och applikationer
* Utveckla och dokumentera tekniska processer och rutiner för molnmiljön


 Vad vi söker
   

  

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete med molnplattformar, främst Azure och/eller AWS
* Gedigen kunskap om serverless-teknologier, containerisering med Docker och Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av automatisering och Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med Terraform eller liknande verktyg
* God förståelse för nätverk, säkerhet och identity management i molnmiljöer
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-processer
* Förmåga att kommunicera tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt och pedagogiskt sätt
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt


 Meriterande erfarenheter
   

  

* Certifieringar inom Azure (AZ-104, AZ-305) eller AWS (Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer)
* Erfarenhet av hybridmiljöer och integration mellan lokala datacenter och molntjänster
* Kunskap om monitoreringsverktyg som Prometheus, Grafana eller Azure Monitor
* Erfarenhet av Python, PowerShell eller Bash för automation
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att implementera säkerhetsramverk och efterlevnad av regulatoriska krav


 Förmåner och utvecklingsmöjligheter på Liminity
   

  

* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter och certifieringar
* Konkurrenskraftiga löner och attraktiva förmåner
* Läs mer om oss och våra erbjudanden i vår handbok


 Känns detta som rätt utmaning för dig? Ansök nu och bli en del av Liminity - framtidens IT-konsultbolag!

title: Engineering Manager
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store
   

  

 brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches as well as Swedish style snus online. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 250 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 Now, we’re on the lookout for a people-driven Engineering Manager to help lay the foundation for Engineering Management within our organization. This is your chance to shape the future of how we work, grow, and innovate within tech. If you’re passionate about people, processes, and progress, keep reading!
   

  

 As our Engineering Manager, you’ll play a key role in making the development team work even better! You’ll have the opportunity to shape team structures, define best practices, and influence how we work together. If you love driving change, enabling high-performing teams, and laying the foundation for future growth, this is your chance to make a real impact!
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lay the groundwork for Engineering Management at Haypp—define processes, best practices, and strategies.
* Lead and mentor our development teams, creating an environment where engineers thrive and grow.
* Be responsible for onboarding and the development of the engineers.
* Be responsible for recruitment, staffing, and resource forecasting.
* Drive internal tech projects to improve ways of working, efficiency, and innovation in close collaboration with Product Owners.
* Be responsible for ensuring that development best practices are a part of the development processes and onboarding.
* Foster a culture of ownership, collaboration, and continuous learning within the development team.
* Set clear, ambitious targets and work with the team to reach them.


**What We Want From You**
 We’re looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, people-first environment and is excited to build something from the ground up. Here’s what will help you succeed:
   

  

* A strong background in engineering leadership – You’ve led teams before and know how to inspire, mentor, and drive results.
* Passion for people management – You believe that empowered engineers build the best products.
* Experience in process management – You know how to structure, improve, and scale ways of working.
* A tech-savvy mindset – While you don’t need to code daily, you understand the challenges of engineering teams.
* A proactive, problem-solving attitude – You take ownership and turn challenges into opportunities.
* Strong collaboration skills – You communicate clearly and know how to align different stakeholders.
* A continuous improvement mindset – You recognize that growth comes from experimentation, learning, and iteration.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *Inclusion & Non-Hierarchy* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Max Moen at max.moen@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Master Data Quality Maintainer - Lund (Sweden)
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Master Data Quality Maintainer. 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our next star**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In this role you will be supporting master Data Team regarding processes for purchased components.From a global request tool, you will receive requests on creating material masters in SAP with given criteria. The team’s assignment is to choose the correct UNSPSC-class and classify materials with data such as dimensions, capacity, voltage, frequency, weight, etc.This demands a high level of accuracy and a sense of detail and skills in searching information related to the components. This is mainly done via datasheets, homepages, and in some cases by phone to the suppliers.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Secure high master data quality
* Running various reports and quality checks.
* Perform changes in ECC /SAP system.
* Handle all agreement changes on parts.
* Assist in productivity improvements by improving/changing todays way of working.


**Requirements**
* Competence and experience within the Master Data Management area
* Excellent knowledge in Microsoft Office (Especially in excel)
* Experience with Power BI
* Experience with Data analytic/Data science
* Experience with SAP ECC knowledge
* Teamplayer with good administrative and analytical skills
* Should have a continuous improvement mindset


 This position is based in
 **Lund (Sweden)**
**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at shivangi@vipas.se.
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Arbetet går ut på att stötta och hjälpa teamet med förvaltning och vidareutveckling av något av våra befintliga system, samt framöver att ta fram ett nytt produktbeställningssystem
 **.**
**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Java 6 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Oracle SQL 6 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med OCP 4 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med GIT 4 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Jenkins 4 år


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med C 5 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Vue 5 år
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med WLS 5 år


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 06-03-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Partner Development Manager - Cortex NEUR
description:
**This role can be based in either Sweden, Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium or Norway.
   

  

 Our Mission**
 At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:
   

  

 Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
   

  

 Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 We take our mission of protecting the digital way of life seriously. We are relentless in protecting our customers and we believe that the unique ideas of every member of our team contributes to our collective success. Our values were crowdsourced by employees and are brought to life through each of us everyday - from disruptive innovation and collaboration, to execution. From showing up for each other with integrity to creating an environment where we all feel included.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you will be shaping the future of cybersecurity. We work fast, value ongoing learning, and we respect each employee as a unique individual. Knowing we all have different needs, our development and personal wellbeing programs are designed to give you choice in how you are supported. This includes our FLEXBenefits wellbeing spending account with over 1,000 eligible items selected by employees, our mental and financial health resources, and our personalized learning opportunities - just to name a few!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Your Career**
 You will center your role on partners relationship management to achieve measurable results in increased revenue, market share, and depth within each partner sales team. Your success in this role will span the creation and execution of unique business plans with each potential. You’ll be measured primarily on the joint business executed with each focus partner defined for your region. You’ll be working within all levels of key Cortex partner organizations and possess a commitment that focuses on developing partnerships based on the long term, “outcome where everybody wins” strategy.
   

  

**Your Impact**
* Develop and execute business plans driving all aspects of the partner relationship to maximize growth opportunities and ensuring the partner is well-positioned to deliver successful customer implementations and recommendations
* Work well in a team environment to ensure partner and customer satisfaction
* Design a compelling value proposition that inspires partners to promote our solutions
* Support partners in developing Managed Services based on our emerging and established technologies increasing revenue growth
* Provide clear and consistent communication across the region with your dedicated partners to build strong partnerships throughout your assignment
* Lead regular business performance and relationship reviews with senior management and various stakeholders
* Build and maintain the activity of performance reports and activity dashboards


**Qualifications**
**Your Experience**
* Experience in Channel/GSI/MSSP Business Management, Channel Management, or Business Development roles within the enterprise software ecosystem and/or network security industry
* Significant experience selling XDR (MDR), XSIAM (SIEM) or other endpoint security offerings
* Knowledge of sales, marketing, and solution development
* Demonstrate strong initiative and ability to think creatively with excellent presentation, written, and overall communication skills
* Consistent track record of leading complex sales situations through negotiation and conflict resolution Additional Information
* Prior experience building relationships with MSSP's, SI/GSI or Service Providers with proven ability to work with key executives
* A hunter mentality, ideally with a combination of channel and end user sales experience
* Solid experience in driving sales consultative selling or business development
* Proven ability to recognize, analyze, and take action on go to market approaches, marketing programs, joint value propositions, and business cases around strategic partnerships
* Cross-functional influence, relationship building, and project management skills toward a broad constituency ranging from customers, channel partners, sales, marketing, and technical management
* Strong business acumen and negotiation abilities
* Great team player with strong drive - Willing to take a leadership role in driving initiatives, working across organizations, and structuring approaches to new opportunities
* Familiarity with a broad range of application and infrastructure software is desirable
* Regular travel will be required post lockdown, including some international trips


**Additional Information**
**The Team**
 The channel organization at Palo Alto Networks is a strategic pillar for our continued growth within cybersecurity, and a critical component to accomplishing our mission. Channel development is an extension of the territory sales team, with an ultimate goal to train and enable our channel partners to become empowered in the use and sales of our products.
   

  

 Our sales team members work hand-in-hand with large organisations around the world to keep their digital environments protected. We educate, inspire, and empower our potential clients in their journey to security.
   

  

 As part of our sales team, you are empowered with unmatched systems and tools, constantly updated research and sales libraries, and a team built on joint success. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our sales team, you are motivated by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredibly complex cyberthreats.
   

  

**Our Commitment**
 We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
   

  

 We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.
   

  

 Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Business Analyst - Consumer Credit
description:
**Join us in reshaping financial wellness.**
 At Anyfin, we’re on a mission to make expensive loans cheaper. The principle is simple: instead of focusing on issuing new loans, we focus on helping people pay them off faster and with a lower cost. Since 2017, we’ve empowered customers in Sweden, Finland, Norway, and Germany to save millions by refinancing costly loans. But we’re not stopping there. As we expand our product offerings and venture into new markets, we’re searching for sharp minds to help us drive growth.
   

  

 If you’re analytical, results-oriented, and eager to make an impact, we’d love to meet you.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Business Analyst, you’ll dive into the core of what we do: credit. Your insights will influence critical decisions, from credit performance to customer acquisition, driving both profitability and business growth.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 You’ll be part of a results-driven team that values collaboration and a shared mission for solving the right problems to create value. Your key responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Credit strategy: Analyze credit performance across markets, optimizing risk and reward to maximize value.
* Customer acquisition: Evaluate customer acquisition costs, lifetime value and design growth strategies.
* Product performance: Deep-dive in our products and the customer experience to improve conversion rate, loyalty and the value they bring.


 This is a high-impact role
   

  

 where your work will shape our success in existing and new markets.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 You’re more than just numbers and spreadsheets—you’re a curious, driven individual with a knack for understanding data and taking actions on insights. This is not a pure analytical role, you will be in the driver seat to make things happen. You thrive in a fast-paced environment where no two days are the same, and you’re eager to make a real difference.
   

  

**Here’s What Success Looks Like In This Role**
**“Must-have’s”**
* Quantitative expertise: With a degree in engineering, finance, mathematics or a related field, you have the technical foundation to tackle data-heavy challenges.
* Analytical competence (more than your degree): You bring a sharp analytical mindset and a love for solving complex puzzles. Whether it’s crunching numbers or finding patterns, you’re in your element.
* A proactive attitude: You’re not one to wait around for instructions. You take the initiative, identify opportunities, and dive in headfirst to drive results.
* Eager to learn: Our business is dynamic, and so are you. You’re excited to dive deep, understand our industry, and grow alongside us.


**“Nice-to-have”**
* A track record of impact: You’ve proven yourself in a similar role, using your skills to deliver real business value.


 Most importantly, you’re someone who thrives in collaboration and believes that the best ideas are born from working together. Your passion for solving problems is matched only by your dedication to making things happen.
   

  

**Why Anyfin?**
 Good question - We’re building something extraordinary—a company with a mission to improve the world’s financial health. At Anyfin, you’ll work with talented colleagues across disciplines, be challenged to grow, and have a tangible impact on our journey.
   

  

**Here’s a Glimpse Of What We Offer**
* A customer-first mindset, driven by a team that values collaboration and camaraderie.
* A centrally located office, four days a week of in-person innovation, and a supportive work culture.
* Competitive compensation, extra time off on your birthday, and more perks to explore.


*We work from the office 4 days a week. Simply because we believe innovation and collaboration happen when we meet in person.*
*Please note: This position is based in Stockholm, and we are unable to provide relocation support.*
 Ready to shape the future of financial health? Apply now and join us on this exciting journey!
   

  

 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to reduce the costs of high-interest loans, get a detailed overview of their fixed costs, and see their credit score.

title: Product Owner Retail
description:
**The Role - What We Need**
 Yabie is seeking a highly motivated Product Owner to lead the development of our Point-of-Sale product for the SMB retail sector. In this role, you will play a key part in shaping the future of our product as we expand our offering in the retail sector. You will identify customer needs and develop innovative solutions to meet those needs. The ideal candidate is passionate about understanding customer pain points and market needs and translating them into actionable product roadmaps. You’ll be a part of our tight-knit product team, and spend much of your time collaborating with our in-house development team.
   

  

**Experience And Skills - Who You Are**
* Get your hands dirty immersing yourself in the SMB retail market in order to identify customer pain points, market trends and needs, and translate this into a structured and prioritized roadmap
* Collaborate closely with stakeholders to drive product initiatives from concept to launch, ensuring alignment across the organization.
* Clearly communicate expectations and provide context to the development team, while also collaborating on final requirements
* Continuously track product performance, gather insights, iterate and refine the roadmap.
* Ensure your plan stays true to Yabie’s overall product vision, where ease of use is paramount


**Qualifications**
* We think that you’re either an experienced Product Owner eager to take on the SMB retail segment with an innovative solution, or an SMB retail expert with a deep understanding of the POS challenges of that sector and a desire to do something about them. Maybe you’re both!
* You’ll spend a lot of time collaborating with developers. You have hands-on experience working in a modern software development environment.
* You'll collaborate closely with stakeholders across the organization. This requires excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively with a diverse range of people.
* You’re great at turning vision into execution, ensuring the development team has clear priorities and expectations. That includes writing and presenting clear, succinct feature descriptions and functional requirements.
* You’re 100% comfortable working, writing and presenting in English to your many non-Swedish co-workers.
* If you speak Swedish at an everyday level, that is a plus as you will be expected to spend time talking to real-world customers
* You thrive in a fast-moving environment in constant change, and enjoy collaborating across teams.


**What's In It For You**
 Join an inspiring and diverse environment with skilled and creative colleagues, where you will directly impact both how we are disrupting the Point-of-Sale (Payment) industry and how we continue to shape our company. With your help, we will keep building our inclusive, friendly culture, aiming for growth by always keeping our merchants in focus while challenging the industry. For the right candidate, Yabie offers many opportunities.
   

  

 We are a fast-growing team of 80 highly motivated people from all over the world. Our HQ is located in the heart of Stockholm. Yabie is well-funded, and among its shareholders, you will find leading investors like Swedbank, Creades, NFT/Collector Ventures, and Brightly Ventures.

title: Data Platform Director
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

 Are you passionate about leading innovative data initiatives and shaping the future of a company where data will be central to its success?
   

  

 Join Mentimeter as our
 **Data Platform Director** 
 , where you will play a crucial role in expanding and guiding our Data Platform Team to achieve mission-critical business goals.
   

  

 At Mentimeter, our Data Platform Team is at the forefront of building data products and services that steer the company's strategic direction. As a pivotal part of our Data and Analytics organization—which includes AI, analytics engineering, data science, data analytics, and insights—the Data Platform Team collaborates closely with our Engineering and Tech Foundation organization. Here, you will develop a robust data ecosystem that supports various departments (Product, Marketing, Sales, and Finance) with both data and infrastructure. Your contributions will directly influence Mentimeter’s business and product decisions, driving us toward a data-driven future.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead and nurture a team of 5 data engineers to design, develop, and deliver modern data platform capabilities and data ecosystem for the company
* Collaborate closely with data engineers, data professionals, engineering leadership and business stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into data platform capabilities
* Define roadmap and requirements for our data platform based on internal and external customer needs, business objectives and market trends
* Prioritize data platform capabilities and initiatives to maximize business value
* Guide the data platform team and engineering through enhancements of data flows across the data ecosystem
* Mentoring and coaching team members to improve skills and knowledge in relevant areas
* Develop and manage project plans, timelines, and budgets for data platform initiatives
* Ensuring compliance with data governance policies and security standards
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in data engineering, and identify opportunities for innovation and improvement


**We believe you have**
* 10 years of experience working with data engineering and data platforms, with at least 4 dedicated years nurturing and leading a team
* Strong understanding of data engineering concepts and technologies, including data pipelines, ETL/ELT processes, data warehousing, and cloud-based data platforms.
* Experience with agile development methodologies
* Great communication, interpersonal, and project management skills - you connect with team members and stakeholders, ensuring everyone is aligned and informed
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills enabling you to approach challenges with a thoughtful and solution-orientated mindset, including communicating technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
* Ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and adapt to changing priorities
* Ability to flourish in a dynamic, exciting, and fast-paced environment


**Nice To Have**
* Experience with AWS, Snowflake, DBT and product management experience


**Not Required**
* Swedish is not required (as daily work is carried out in English and the Mentimeter team currently boasts 50+ different nationalities)


**Not sure if you meet 100% of our qualifications?**
 Apply anyway and let us know why you would enjoy working in this particular role at Mentimeter!
   

  

 At Mentimeter where we currently boast over 50+ different nationalities, you'll be part of a culture that values creativity, innovation, and inclusivity. We believe in supporting our team members' growth and offering them the platform to excel. If you're eager to contribute to our mission and make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you.
   

  

*Please note that this role will have its base in our Stockholm office and is primarily an onsite role, with the opportunity to work from home twice per week.*
*Learn more about Our Ways of Working - Guiding Principles*
**The Recruitment Process**
* Introduction interview - Meet TA rep and hiring manager for introduction interviews
* Competence interview - Meet the team for an onsite interview and conduct a live case exercise showcasing your relevant skills, technical knowledge and core strategic competencies
* Alva Labs tests - Conduct a personality and logical ability test as part of the screening process
* Culture & Leadership interview - Reflect more about our 5 core values and why you would be a great fit at Mentimeter


**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Customer Service Agent - Student Worker Sweden
description:
**Who We Are**
 Since our start in 2017 we have provided smart tools that help put financial power back in the hands of the people – where we believe it belongs. Everything we do is based on one vision: to improve the world’s financial health.
   

  

 So far, we’ve helped Swedes, Finns, Norwegians and Germans save millions by refinancing expensive consumer credits. But we aim higher. New markets, new tools, new products and new ways of improving people’s financial lives. This means we need more brains and hearts to fuel our growth. That is why we are currently searching for an Operations Agent - Student Worker for all our three tracks: Care, Success and Risk.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 Being an Operations Student Worker at Anyfin consists of three major areas:
   

  

* Analysing and evaluating more complicated customer applications to deliver suitable offers.
* Handling inbound communication with customers via email, phone, chat and social media.
* Handling outbound communication to increase our customer base.In addition, we offer three different development tracks in the Swedish Operations team. These are: Risk, Care and Success. We are truly passionate about being on the customers side and creating an outstanding customer experience. As a part of our tightly knit team you will impact the customer and the success of the company on a daily basis.


**We Believe You**
* Have excellent communication skills in Swedish and English
* Are keen to learn and willing to take initiative
* Are self-motivated, fearless and have a great desire to contribute to the team and. spread a positive atmosphere around you
* Are willing to work between 15-20 hours/week (with start as soon as possible)


**What We Offer**
 We offer you the chance to be part of something truly amazing. With strong backers and a world class team there is no limit to what we can achieve together. We were founded with a vision of challenging and transforming an industry that today is not taking into account the people it is supposed to serve.
   

  

 We are making a change. We have built a company of passionate doers with a curious urge to always do things better and smarter. We innovate, build and iterate. We promise that you will be challenged, pushed to develop your skill set and get the opportunity to work alongside amazing and smart colleagues.
   

  

 While we've had a good run so far it is what lies ahead that excites everyone that works here, and we are just getting started.
   

  

 We cannot wait to meet you!
   

  

**About Anyfin**
**Who are we?**
 Anyfin is an innovative startup with a mission to help people to become their best financial self. We know that money can be tricky for many, therefore we wanted to create an easier way of understanding and improving your finances.
   

  

**What do we do?**
 Anyfin is a smart financial-app where you get a great overview of your spendings, income, subscriptions and much more. We also provide a service that helps lowering the cost of consumer loans and credits by reducing high interests, and removing unnecessary fees. Overall, the app is a great tool to understand your finances better.
   

  

**What about the future?**
 We are constantly growing and by 2024 we will launch even more services. Fun, huh? Come join our journey and work with ambitious people from all over the world. (Our office is based in Stockholm.)
   

  

 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to reduce the costs of high-interest loans, get a detailed overview of their fixed costs, and see their credit score.

title: Customer Service Agent - Sweden
description:
**Who We Are**
 Since our start in 2017, we've been on a mission to disrupt the status quo by arming individuals with savvy tools to reclaim control of their finances and debts– because we firmly believe that's where the power truly should lie, in the hands of our users. Every move we make is guided by a singular vision: to turbocharge the financial well-being of our customers.
   

  

 Thus far, we've provided financial easement for Swedes, Finns, Norwegians, and Germans, helping them pocket millions by reducing the interest rates on consumer credit and giving high interest rates kick to the curb. But we're not stopping here; we're hungry for more. We're eyeing new frontiers, fresh products, and in general aiming to revolutionize financial empowerment. As an Operations Agent, you're not just joining a team – you're diving into a wild ecosystem where innovation reigns supreme, surrounded by comrades who are relentless, adaptable, and hell-bent on delivering nothing short of stellar service.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 We firmly believe that everyone deserves a shot at financial freedom, and assisting our users in wrangling their debts remains our top priority. In this role, you'll not only bolster our existing efforts but also unearth new tactics to keep up with the ever-evolving needs of our users. Naturally, you'll rally alongside an amazing team across various fronts, but beyond that, you'll be at the forefront of our crusade, leading the charge in shaping a culture of innovation and collaboration in a high-octane environment. And if that's not enough, buckle up for a rollercoaster ride of responsibilities, including:
   

  

* Providing clear and concise service, both in the written and spoken word.
* Drawing from the trenches of your experience in customer service or support roles to tackle inquiries and quash concerns like a pro.
* Analyzing and dissecting complex credit applications, all while sticking to our credit policies like glue.
* Taking on the mantle of assessing worthy candidates for debt refinancing with gusto.
* Pitching in to finesse our processes and take our customer care game to the next level.


**Who You Are**
 In order to succeed in this role we believe that you have:
   

  

* Battle scars from previous roles in customer service or support roles, ideally in a similar capacity.
* A hunger for numbers and a knack for untangling tricky problems.
* Fluency in Swedish and English


 And maybe, just maybe…
   

  

* A battle-hardened 1-2 years of experience in credit assessment.


**What We Offer You**
 An epicenter of energy and innovation nestled in the beating heart of Stockholm, complete with a rockstar company culture and enough breakfasts, after-work bashes, and stocked refreshments to keep you fueled for the revolution 😎
   

  

 Being part of an awesome team, guided by a fearless Team Manager who's seen it all.
   

  

 Enough vacation days to make the Nine Realms jealous, top-tier tech gear, health and wellness perks to keep you fighting fit for the battles ahead.
   

  

 And not least a chance to carve your name into the annals of financial history, shaping and elevating our customer experience.
   

  

 Work Hours: Flexible schedules fit for warriors, with options for either 8-17 or 9-18 on weekdays.
   

  

 Location: Right smack dab in the throbbing heart of Stockholm City.
   

  

 Start Date: Yesterday! But hey, we'll settle for ASAP.
   

  

 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to reduce the costs of high-interest loans, get a detailed overview of their fixed costs, and see their credit score.

title: Social Media Content Creator
description:
**About The Job**
**Join the Wella Company as Interim Social Media Expert in Northern Europe.**
**About The Wella Company**
 Together,
 **WE** 
 enable individuals to look, feel, and be their true selves.
   

  

 Wella Company is one of the world’s leading beauty companies, comprised of a family of iconic brands such as Wella Professionals, Clairol, OPI, Nioxin and ghd. With 6,000 employees globally, presence in over 100 countries, Wella Company and its brands enable consumers to look, feel, and be their true selves. As innovators in the hair and nail industry, Wella Company empowers its people to delight consumers, inspire beauty professionals, engage communities, and deliver sustainable growth to its stakeholders. For additional information about the Wella Company please visit www.wellacompany.com.
   

  

 The role:
   

  

 We are looking for an experienced and passionated social media expert who has experience on creating social media stratgies for big consumer brands on a multimarket level as well as having an eye and being able to manage content creation. This is a unique opportunity to join a global company where you have the opportunity to to shape the full Northern Europe (Nordics + Benelux) social media strategy for a diverse portfolio of beauty brands.
   

  

**What You Will Do:**
* Revolutionize the social media landscape within hair and nails by taking our social media and content strategy to the next level!
* Plan and maintain content calendars, publishing schedules and create timelines for Wella's social channels, in line with our strategic vision.
* Evaluate global content and ensure that it is relevant for our diverse markets and adapt it to our local market.
* Produce strategic social media campaigns that drive brand buzz from global and tailored local content in collaboration with content creators, hairdressers, and influencers.
* Manage relationships with key internal and external stakeholders, such as influencer marketing, performance, agencies, educators, and content creators.
* Continuously measure, analyse, and report on data and consumer behaviours as well as always stay updated on the latest trends and technologies in social media.


**What We Are Looking For:**
* Bachelor's Degree.
* 3-5 years of experience in Social Media strategies & content creation from managing social media platform for big global consumer brands either inhouse or from an agency.
* Expertise in social and digital landscape.
* Content writing and copywriting
* Video Production and Editing
* Strong analytical skills and proficiency in social media tools as Sprinklr.
* Excellent communication and organizational skills.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and strong in project management.
* Beauty experience is preferred as well as at least fluent in one of the Nordic languages or in Dutch.


**Join Us:**
 If you are a social media wizard with a passion for innovation and a track record of driving impactful campaigns, we want to hear from you! Apply now and be part of the Wella journey to redefine social media excellence.
   

  

**EEO OPPORTUNITIES**
 We offer equal employment opportunity to qualified individuals without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Wella Company with federal and state disability laws and makes reasonable accommodations for applicants and employees with disabilities. If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please contact us at: https://www.wellacompany.com/consumer-affairs
   

  

 We strongly believe that cultivating a diverse workplace gives a company strength. The combination of unique skills, abilities, experiences and backgrounds creates an environment that produces extraordinary results. EOE Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Disabled.
   

  

**English**

title: Sopra Sterias Accelerateprogram 2025
description:
Om rollen
   

  

**Sopra Sterias Accelerateprogram 2025**
 Genom vårt traineeprogram Accelerate, som blivit utsett till Sveriges bästa inom IT av Karriärföretagen, rivstartar du din karriär som konsult inom digital transformation.
   

  

 Sopra Steria Accelerate ger dig med höga ambitioner en strukturerad utvecklingsplan för dina första tre år i konsultyrket. Vi vet att den största utvecklingen som konsult sker genom att jobba i riktiga kunduppdrag och att få lära sig i skarpt läge. Därför är du konsult från start och kommer till största delen att bygga din kompetens genom att jobba i uppdrag hos någon av våra kunder.
   

  

 Parallellt med ditt uppdrag erbjuder vi dig utbildning som stärker din kompetens och ger dig relevanta verktyg inom flera olika verksamhetsområden. Alla utbildningar är skräddarsydda för att du ska utvecklas i konsultrollen och träna tillsammans med kollegor i en trygg miljö. Exempel på utbildningar inom programmet är Explore Team Delivery och Develop your Innovation Skills. Inom programmet ges du möjlighet att bygga ett brett nätverk både genom arbete i projekt och uppdrag med kollegor inom Sopra Steria.
   

  

 Hos oss blir du anställd från dag ett och får en marknadsmässig lön. Vi erbjuder helt enkelt ett inspirerande och utvecklande program för dig som är nyutexaminerad och vill ha en framgångsrik karriär som konsult. Vårt mål är att du ska lyckas och utveckla dig till att bli en av marknadens vassaste konsulter.
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder Följande Inriktningar 2025**
* Advisory (Stockholm, Göteborg)
* Data & Analytics (Stockholm)
* Digital Platform Services (Stockholm)
* Microsoft Business Applications CRM (Stockholm, Göteborg)
* Systemutveckling (Stockholm, Göteborg)


 Här kan du läsa mer om programmet och se mer information kring inriktningarna:
 **Inriktningar traineeprogram Accelerate (soprasteria.se)**
**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Är på väg att avsluta dina studier eller är nyutexaminerad på kandidat- eller masternivå från universitet eller högskola (examen 2024 eller 2025).
* Har läst en ingenjörsutbildning eller annan relevant teknisk utbildning inom data/systemvetenskap, IT eller liknande.
* Har goda kunskaper i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.
* Är både en bra lyssnare och en god kommunikatör vilket gör att du kan se nya möjligheter i ditt uppdrag. En av de saker som symboliserar en framgångsrik konsult är högt affärsmannaskap. Ute i ditt uppdrag är du en relationsbyggare för Sopra Steria och kunden.
* Är ambitiös och målinriktad och kan visa att du klarar att förverkliga det du har bestämt dig för att göra, både genom studier och på fritiden. Vi ser gärna att du har visat driv och nyfikenhet genom att engagera dig i olika aktiviteter vid sidan om dina studier.
* Framför allt, brinner du för att jobba med digitalisering!


**Ansökan**
 Vi arbetar med löpande urval i denna process, så ansök redan idag genom att ladda upp ditt CV samt betyg eller examensbevis från din utbildning. Betyg eller examensbevis ska bifogas under “övriga bilagor” i ansökan. Skicka inte med ett personligt brev. Om du är intresserad av Accelerateprogrammet men osäker på vilken inriktning du ska välja, hjälper vi dig att hitta rätt under rekryteringsprocessen. Vi förväntar oss dock att du har läst på om de olika inriktningarna som är öppna i år innan intervjun och har en uppfattning om vilka områden som intresserar dig mest. Om du går vidare i rekryteringsprocessen kommer du att få ett utskick med logik- och personlighetstest, vilka är obligatoriska i vår rekryteringsprocess.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-03-31
   

  

 Sopra Steria har kunder och projekt som kan kräva säkerhetsgodkännande på olika nivåer.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.
