title: Head of Accounting & Payroll
description:
We are now looking for an experienced Head of Accounting & Payroll to lead our financial operations, streamline processes, and scale our finance function. This is a key role in ensuring Voyado's financial health and compliance as we expand both in Sweden and into new markets!
   

  

**Voyado** 
 is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, the Voyado customer experience cloud makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Head of Accounting & Payroll at Voyado, you will oversee our financial operations, including accounting, payroll, and systems optimization. You’ll play an important role in the strategy related to our financial processes, automated workflows, and the scaling our finance function to support our global growth as we expand. In this role you will report to the CFO.
   

  

**Some of your tasks:**
* Lead and Develop Team: Manage, mentor, and grow a team of 4 accounting and payroll professionals, fostering a high-performance and collaborative culture.
* Optimize Financial Processes: Design and streamline accounting and payroll workflows, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and compliance as the company grows.
* Ensure Compliance & Reporting: Oversee tax compliance, financial reporting, and internal controls, ensuring accuracy in financial data and adherence to Swedish regulations.
* Multi-Country Consolidations: Oversee multi-country financial consolidations for operations across the Nordics, Benelux, UK, and Germany, ensuring accurate reporting and compliance with local regulations.


 So, who are you?
   

  

 We believe you have a proven record of leading successful finance teams. Monthly- and annual closings and standards such as IFRS and/or K3 are stuff you've worked with for a while, and you're now looking for an opportunity to grow and develop a team while being involved in setting strategies for scalability, efficiency, and general improvements. As we grow into new markets we believe experience in consolidating multi-country entities would be a strong plus.
   

  

 We see it as highly meritorious if you have experience in implementing financial systems and if you also have experience from the SaaS or similar tech-driven industry you are probably a great match!
   

  

 With that said, Voyado is a dynamic and ever-changing organization. We believe a natural tendency to take responsibility for progress, being result-oriented while keeping things structured, and communicating in a good way with different stakeholders (internally and externally) are keys to success in the context we operate.
   

  

 What's in it for you?
   

  

 Voyado is a Swedish purpose-driven company where every opinion is recognized and where you’ll be successful when putting the customers first. Here, you'll get the opportunity to work self-driven with strong support that you can leverage at any time. We really care for our Voyadoers and put a lot of time and effort into keeping and nurturing our knowledge-sharing and friendly culture. We’re personal and that extends into everything about us. Read more on what it’s like to work at Voyado
 **here** 
 .
   

  

 Some of our benefits:
   

  

* 30 days of vacation, so you can spend time on the things you love
* A generous gadget-and-phone package (your choice!)
* 5000 SEK per year in wellness allowance
* A gym at the office!
* A wellness hour you can use every week
* Beneficial bike lease, including e-bikes
* Breakfast buffet on Fridays


 More on Voyado
   

  

 We are now a company of 340+ colleagues on an exciting journey and have recently established a presence in new markets to strengthen our position in Europe. If you are ready for your next adventure and want to join our team on our expansion throughout Europe and have an interest in customer care, e-commerce, retail, and tech - let's get in touch!
   

  

 Ready to find out more?
   

  

 Fantastic! 🎉
   

  

 We'd love to get to know you and understand what makes you tick, so write a few lines about what you enjoy about your current role and what would be an exciting challenge for you in the future. We are eager to get to know you and what you love
   

  

 to do, so be yourself and let your passion shine through in your application!
   

  

 Additional information
   

  

 We conduct a background check on the final candidate as part of our recruitment process. We use background checks from
 **Scandinavian Recruitment Intelligence** 
 .
 **Here** 
 you can read more about how a background check is done.
   

  

 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, the Voyado customer experience cloud makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.

title: (Senior) Lawyer qualified in Luxembourgish law - based  in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support. The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its
 **Legal Directorate (JU) -** 
**Legal Corporate Department (CORP)** 
 -
 **Procurement and Administrative Law Division (PA)** 
 at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a
 **(Senior) Lawyer qualified in Luxembourgish law\***
**This is a full time position at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
* internal benchmark: (Senior) Officer Legal Services


*Panel interviews are foreseen as from November.*
 Purpose
   

  

 The purpose of the role is to provide legal support to the administration and other directorates for legal issues within the remit of the Division with a particular emphasis on Luxembourg law governed corporate topics (contract law, construction and real estate, intellectual property, litigation, etc.). The work involves activities of various complexity and non-standard nature (taking instructions from the Head of Division on highly sophisticated and complex legal matters).
   

  

 Operating network
   

  

 You will report to the Head of Division and cooperate with the other lawyers of the team. You will liaise with other colleagues from the Legal Directorate, including Directors and General Director, as well as other Directorates. The role may involve liaison with external legal counsel and local authorities.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Participate in the negotiation, drafting and / or review of legal documentation relating to all larger contracts with the Bank, including for construction and real estate issues.
* Participate in providing advice on specific legal issues relating to the Bank’s presence in Luxembourg.
* Participate in providing advice on contractual rights and obligations and on how to manage risks associated to contracts subject to Luxembourg law entered for the Bank’s own account, including in the fields of construction and real estate.
* Participate in providing advice on how to manage risks associated with dispute resolution and pre-litigation issues in the above-mentioned fields.
* Cooperate actively with other services within the Bank, taking a proactive, solution-oriented approach.
* Advise on “administrative” (in particular Luxembourg law governed) matters, for instance intellectual property issues.
* Participate in providing advice on dispute resolution before Luxembourg Courts.
* Participate in, and advise on, the negotiation and drafting of agreements, notably in connection with the EIB Institute’s action.
* Conduct legal research and studies on issues of law arising in connection with the division’s tasks and competencies.
* Keep up to date knowledge of legislation, regulations and jurisprudence pertaining to the tasks and competencies of the division.
* Develop and maintain relationships within the Bank and represent EIB externally.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) in law.
* Admission to practice in Luxembourg (List I or List II) is preferred. Admission to practise in another member state of the European Union is an advantage
* Minimum of 5 years of relevant professional experience in any of the fields of Commercial law, Construction / Real Estate law, preferably in the Luxembourgish context. Litigation experience would be an advantage.
* Experience in advising and drafting legal documentation in the abovementioned fields in French and English
* Solid knowledge of civil law fundamentals.
* Familiarity with standard IT tools and Bank working procedures.
* Fluency in written and spoken English and French are required. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


 Competencies
   

  

 Find out more about EIB core competencies here
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

**Deadline for applications: This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.**

title: Network SME - Remote
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Network Subject Matter Expert 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our next star**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are looking for a highly skilled Network Subject Matter Expert specialising in router, switch, and firewall configuration within an Operational Technology (OT) environment.As a Network Subject Matter Expert, your primary responsibility will be to work on the network implementation of our standard NRA 2.0 solution. Your expertise in routing, switching and management of virtualised network will be crucial in ensuring the protection, availability, and compliance of industrial control systems.You will be reporting directly to the Senior Engineering Manager.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Network Design: collaborate with clients and internal stakeholders to design the integration of the standard NRA 2.0 solution into APMT Terminal infrastructure. Create and document Layer 2 / Layer 3 integration plans into the exiting Terminal Local and Wide Area Network.
* Implementation Planning: develop implementation plans and create implementation scripts. Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors to ensure smooth execution of network implementation projects, adhering to established standards and best practices.
* Network Configuration: configure networking equipment such as routers, switches, firewalls, etc in accordance with project requirements and Maersk’s internal standards.
* Integration and Testing: collaborate with the Test Management team and the Terminal IT Team to conduct rigorous testing and troubleshooting to identify and resolve network issues.
* Support Program Go-Live milestones and provide assistance during Hypercare periods.
* Documentation and Training: create detailed documentation, including network diagrams, configurations, and troubleshooting guides, to ensure accurate and up-to-date information for future reference.


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Relevant certifications (e.g., CCNA or CCNP Routing & Switching, CompTIA Network+, VMware Certified Network Virtualisation) are advantageous.
* 4 plus years of experience of Routing and Switching technologies and protocols.
* The candidate must have working experience with Cisco Nexus 9K series datacenter switching platform, including vPC configuration.
* The candidate must have working experience with Cisco Enterprise and Industrial switching platforms.
* The candidate must have working experience in configuring and managing VMware NSX-T based network technologies.
* The candidate must have working experience in configuring and managing Cisco ASA and Firepower based network technologies.
* Understanding of Enterprise grade firewall technologies such as Checkpoint, Palo Alto etc.
* Understanding of forward and reverse proxy technologies is an advantage.
* Understanding of OT applications commonly used in terminal operations, including but not limited to Terminal Operating
* Systems (TOS), Gate Operating Systems (GOS), EDI, CCTV, Access Control systems, SCADA solutions, PLCs, etc is an advantage.
* Understanding of ISA-95, 99 and Purdue model.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex security issues and develop effective solutions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, able to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at various levels.
* Proactive mindset with a continuous learning approach to keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and security threats in the OT domain.
* Demonstrated ability to work under pressure, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a dynamic and challenging environment. Strong attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high standards of security and compliance.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at shivangi@vipas.se.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: System Engineer
company_industry: Electric Power Transmission, Control, and Distribution
description:
Do you want to be part of facilitating the green transition? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your actions drive meaningful change? Do you enjoy solving hard problems together with ambitious people? If this sounds like you, this could be a perfect match.
   

  

**Join us to facilitate the green transition**
 Electrification and the transition to fossil-free energy create fantastic opportunities for us as individuals, as a company, and for society at large. However, it also creates challenges, especially for our energy system. Ingrid Capacity is an energy tech company founded in 2022, and we are determined to solve some of the hardest challenges that stand in the way of the green transition by leveraging new technology and pioneering software development. We develop and optimize flexible energy assets such as large-scale battery energy storage to store electricity when there is a production surplus and return it to the system when there is a shortage. This ensures the stability of the grid, increases the uptake of renewable energy sources such as wind and solar, and maximizes the utilization of the grid in a cost-efficient manner.
   

  

 Today, Ingrid Capacity is in a rapid growth phase with a historic expansion of energy storage in Sweden, while also expanding internationally. We are in the final phase of construction of around 200 MW and will soon enter a new phase of construction of another 200 MW, with a total development pipeline of over 5 GW across Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a System Engineer, you will play a key role in managing and securing support systems for Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) facilities. In this role you will work both strategically and operationally. This includes taking a leading role in ensuring robust cybersecurity for OT systems, while also owning the product management of EMS (Energy Management Systems), PPC (Power Plant Controller) and SCADA (Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition) systems. Your responsibilities will encompass implementing advanced security protocols, lifecycle management, overseeing system commissioning, and maintaining efficient and secure network solutions.
   

  

 This role is part of the Engineering team, but you will work closely with the Asset Management and Tech teams to ensure seamless integration, security, and operation of our systems.
   

  

**Cybersecurity**
**Key tasks and responsibilities:**
* Drive the development and implementation of advanced security strategies for OT systems.
* Ensure compliance with relevant cybersecurity standards and regulations.
* Conduct regular risk assessments and vulnerability analyses for operational systems, including SCADA, PPC and EMS.
* Maintain and enhance secure communication network solutions on-site, between sites, and with data centers.
* Act as the key point of contact for cybersecurity audits and incident response coordination.


**Product Ownership**
* Lead lifecycle management of EMS, PPC and SCADA systems, including maintenance, procurement, and managing supplier relationships.
* Oversee the commissioning process of EMS, PPC and SCADA systems during new builds or system replacements, ensuring alignment with project goals. Note: This role does not involve direct project management of commissioning but focuses on oversight and alignment.


**System Maintenance**
* Ensure the smooth and secure operation of support systems and network solutions.
* Support the development and procurement of new system solutions with a focus on security.


**Stakeholder Coordination**
* Act as a key point of contact, ensuring that relevant information is effectively communicated to internal and external stakeholders.


**To be a good match with the role, we believe that you have:**
* Several years of experience in a similar role, e.g. within the energy sector.
* Experience in working with OT security and advanced network solutions.
* Fluent language skills in English, both written and verbal.


**In Addition, The Following Is Highly Meritorious**
* B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Engineering (e.g. in electrical engineering, energy, or energy systems) or related field.
* Experience in working with EMS or PPC systems.
* Experience in working with assets within the energy sector.
* Experience in working with SCADA or power market integration platforms.
* Experience in working with IT security solutions.


**Your Personal Skills**
 In addition to relevant work experience, we’re looking for someone with the right personal skills and motivation. Skills we evaluate for this role:
   

  

 Proactivity – Ability to take initiative and manage responsibilities independently.
   

  

 Problem-solving and decision-making – Capable of assessing challenges, drawing conclusions, and prioritizing effectively.
   

  

 Analytical skills – You know how to collect and assess vast amounts of information, identify patterns and trends.
   

  

 Communication and relationship-building skills – You are a highly communicative individual, able to maintain effective and professional communication with team members and external partners.
   

  

 Team player – You thrive in a collaborative environment and work seamlessly with colleagues and management to achieve common goals.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 At Ingrid Capacity, we are not just employees; we are pioneers, visionaries, and catalysts for change. We are at the forefront of the global energy transition, dedicated to shaping the future of power generation. Our company is more than a workplace; it is a platform for innovation, where we dare to push boundaries and turn bold ideas into reality.
   

  

 We firmly believe that the foundation of any successful company lies in its culture. At Ingrid Capacity, we understand that building a thriving organization demands more than just technology and innovation; it requires a company culture firmly rooted in trust, growth, and the ability to learn from mistakes. We believe that skills can be nurtured in a variety of contexts, starting from within oneself and growing together with people we trust. We are also serious about the wellbeing of our colleagues and having fun together, and with regularly hosted social activities and group training classes, we create a workplace where we can truly thrive.
   

  

**Application**
 Sounds like a match? Don’t be a stranger and welcome to apply! We’ll make selections on an ongoing basis and finalize the recruitment as soon as we’ve found the perfect match.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 /Team Ingrid Capacity

title: Network Engineer
description:
**N E T W O R K E N G I N E E R
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent
   

  

**A B O U T X E N I T**
 Xenit is a growth company which specializes in Cloud and modern work. Our committed employees inspire, challenge and encourage each other, while providing extensive value for our customers.
   

  

 Xenit is
 **Microsoft's Partner of the Year, Sweden** 
 for 2024, illustrating our commitment to technical development, being on the cutting edge of tech, and our close partnership with Microsoft.
   

  

**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 We are looking for a talented
 **Network Engineer** 
 to join Xenit's Cloud Infrastructure team. Currently, within our Cloud Enablement department, there is only one dedicated Network resource, and we'd really like to increase that to two. This would be someone to take over some of our existing projects, to work with our Network as a Service, and to bolster our Network offering for prospective new customers.
   

  

**Examples Of Potential Tasks**
* Configuring new customer sites
* Planning and executing firewall & network implementation projects, and completing documentation
* Supporting other teams/team members with networking questions
* Helping with network pre-sale and design when selling Network as a Service.


**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next Network Engineer Has**
* 5 years experience with Networks: Firewalls (preferably Palo Alto), Switching, Routing, Troubleshooting.
* The ability to perform basic server set ups
* An understanding of overall infrastructure - Servers, Virtualization, Security, Cloud services (Azure as a preference).
* Experience with both Network pre-sale and design.


**It Is a Bonus If You Have**
* Knowledge of IT-Security
* Experience with authentication and federation (Active Directory/NPS, SAML, OIDC/OAUTH)
* Relevant Microsoft, Cisco or Palo Alto certifications
* Knowledge of ITIL


**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
* Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes responsibility for their work
* Finds joy in learning about new technologies, and wants to keep up to date with trends in their field
* Has a methodical and structured way of working
* Understands complex issues and is able to solve them - making sensible and rational judgements.
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do 💕


**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**Benefits 🎁**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package, read full list here.
   

  

**Super interesting colleagues 🎉**
 With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, art historians, rugby players, puzzle maniacs, film geeks and much more.
   

  

 With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is an incredible drive and passion for what they do.
   

  

**Activities ⛹🏻**
 Each quarter, we host
 **Xenit Inspire** 
 where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centered around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building, after works, and "Bring a Buddy" lunches at the office.
   

  

 Last year, Xenit was awarded
 **"Career Company of 2024"** 
 . This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.
   

  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*
**Read More About Karriar Företagen Here.**
 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive - working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment & working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?

title: Uppsökande säljare inom IT-hårdvara med fokus på nya kunder
description:
Nu söker vi en driven nykundsäljare med erfarenhet inom IT-hårdvara som vill bli en del av Iver och som vill vara med och bidra till bättre IT-lösningar som gör skillnad för våra kunder! Vi söker dig som har en förmåga att göra komplex IT enkel och som gillar att upprätthålla värdefulla kundrelationer. På Iver är lagandan stark och nu har du chansen att bli en del av vårt framgångsrika säljteam inom Iver. Är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 Ivers erbjuder bland annat en komplett livscykelhantering för datorer och mobila enheter – från logistik och asset management till återbruk och hållbar återvinning. Tjänsten erbjuder en komplett arbetsplats med konfigurerade och färdiginstallerade datorer och/eller mobila enheter med möjlighet att skräddarsy support, administration av applikationer, uppdateringar och policys. Det är en flexibel och skalbar lösning för våra kunder, som är enkel att skala upp och ner.
   

  

 Affären växer och vi satsar på att utveckla området inom Iver. Vi söker en engagerad och målinriktad säljare som brinner för att hitta nya affärsmöjligheter och skapa långsiktiga kundrelationer inom IT-hårdvara. Du kommer att ha en nyckelroll i att leda hela säljcykeln med allt från att identifiera affärsmöjligheter, kvalificering, utveckla lösningen, skriva offerter, prissättning, skapa presentationer för ledande befattningar, förhandla och stänga affärer.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
* Aktivt och uppsökande bearbeta nya kunder inom olika branscher och segment.
* Bygga och utveckla kundrelationer från första kontakt till långsiktiga samarbeten.
* Identifiera kunders behov av IT-hårdvara och presentera skräddarsydda lösningar som skapar värde och effektivitet.
* Leda presentationsmöten, demonstrationer och förhandlingar med potentiella kunder.
* Arbeta självständigt för att nå och överträffa individuella försäljningsmål.
* Samarbeta med vårt tekniska team för att säkerställa att våra lösningar möter kundernas krav och behov.
* Regelbundet rapportera och följa upp försäljningsaktivitet och resultat.


**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 Iver - We empower our Nordic society. Hos Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. På Iver är vi inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden. Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
   

  

**Din profil & Bakgrund?**
 För att lyckas i rollen hos oss tror vi att du har dokumenterad framgångsrik erfarenhet av uppsökande försäljning inom IT-branschen, gärna inom IT-hårdvara. Du brinner för att göra affärer genom personligt engagemang, innovativa lösningar och kompetens i framkant, med målet att vara en långsiktig och hållbar partner. I rollen kommer du att möta kunder och nyckelpersoner i ledande befattningar och behöver ha förmågan att snabbt bygga förtroende. Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet och vill att du utvecklas tillsammans med oss, både som säljare och medarbetare för att bidra till arbetsglädje, vår tillväxt och ett bra kundbemötande.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Är van att skapa nya affärsmöjligheter genom proaktivt prospektering och kallringning.
* Har en god teknisk förståelse för IT-hårdvara och kan snabbt sätta dig in i kunders behov av produkter och relaterade lösningar.
* Är en självständig, målmedveten och resultatinriktad person som trivs med att jobba i en snabb och föränderlig miljö.
* Är van att arbeta med CRM-system och följa upp aktiviteter och resultat på ett strukturerat sätt.
* Talar och skriver flytande svenska och engelska.
* B-körkort.


**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Sverige och Norge. Denna tjänst utgår från vårt kontor i Solna men du kommer att bearbeta affären inom hela vår marknad.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-03-16. Du är välkommen att kontakta Henrik Olsson (henrik.olsson@iver.se) vid eventuella frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.

title: Jakt- och klövviltsansvarig till Svealand
description:
**Välkommen till en grön värld av möjligheter hos oss på Sveaskog. Vi erbjuder dig skogen – en vacker arbetsplats och framför allt ett av våra viktigaste bidrag för att klara utmaningar kopplade till klimatförändringar och framtidens råvaruförsörjning. Nu söker vi en jakt- och klövviltsansvarig till region Svealand som vill vara med oss på resan.**
**Vi erbjuder**
 Att arbeta på Sveaskog innebär stor frihet samtidigt som du förväntas ta ansvar, visa mod och vara nyfiken, Sveaskogs värdeord. I allas uppdrag ingår att ta ansvar för sin egen och verksamhetens utveckling och att vara en bra kollega. Vi kallar det aktivt medarbetarskap. Vi erbjuder dig attraktiva förmåner och en arbetsplats som kännetecknas av en vilja att du ska lyckas, där jämställdhet och hållbart arbetsliv står högt på agendan. Sveaskog eftersträvar mångfald och en jämn könsfördelning inom alla yrken i företaget.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Jakt och fiske är en viktig resurs som ska förvaltas på ett klokt och hållbart sätt. Jakten är ett viktigt verktyg för att anpassa viltstammen till fodersituation, skadenivå och biologisk mångfald. Klövviltets antal ska anpassas så att Sveriges långsiktiga mål för skogsskötsel och naturvård uppnås. Vi eftersträvar friska klövviltsstammar av god kvalitet i växtliga skogar utan alltför stora viltbetesskador.
   

  

 På Sveaskog arbetar tio jakt- och klövviltsansvariga fördelat på fem olika regioner. Till region Svealand söker vi nu en jakt- och klövviltsansvarig som ska företräda Sveaskog i jakt- och klövviltsfrågor på regionen. På regionen arbetar idag två Jakt- och klövviltsansvariga och en Fiskeansvarig.
   

  

 I rollen som jakt- och klövviltsansvarig leder du arbetet med klövviltsförvaltningen och ansvarar för att utveckla jaktaffären på regionen tillsammans med regionens medarbetare. Arbetet innebär externa kontakter där du samverkar med kunder, jägare, andra markägande bolag, myndigheter och företrädare för intresseorganisationer. I rollen kommer du att ingå i Sveaskogs interna nätverk för jakt- och klövviltsansvariga. Arbetet kräver en del kvälls- samt helgjobb vilket gör att du måste vara beredd att arbeta på obekväma tider. Tjänsten innehåller en del resor i samband med fysiska möten.
   

  

**I Rollen Kommer Du Också Att Arbeta Med**
* Administration av avtal, personliga jaktkort, fakturahantering, avskjutningsrapport och tilldelning
* Ansvara för budget och verksamhetsplan för ditt arbetsområde
* Analysera foderprognos, inventeringsresultat samt upprätta förvaltningsplaner
* Företräda Sveaskog i älgförvaltnings- och älgskötselområden
* Aktivt arbeta tillsammans med jaktlag till exempel genom jaktledarutbildning och rekrytering av nya jägare


 Stationering i Skinnskatteberg alternativt Örebro. Du kommer att rapportera till Skogsanvarig på regionen.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Du har en relevant skoglig akademisk utbildning eller motsvarande kompetens. Du har erfarenhet av skogligt arbete och då gärna med fokus på jakt- och fiskefrågor. Du har goda IT-kunskaper samt grundläggande GIS-kunskaper.
   

  

 Som person är du är resultatorienterad och har en god analysförmåga och ett strukturerat arbetssätt. Du är initiativtagande och har förmåga att arbeta självständigt. Du har hög integritet och en god kommunikativ förmåga, såväl i tal som i skrift.
   

  

**Vill du bli vår kollega?**
 Välkommen att söka jobbet senast den 2025-03-14.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Skogsansvarig Börje Eriksson, tel 010-544 95 56.
   

  

 Fackliga kontaktpersoner är för Akademikerföreningen Emil Linell, tel 072-201 80 01 för Ledarna Thomas Esbjörnsson, tel 070-550-82-35 och för Unionen Ove Ejemalm, tel 070-275 88 67.
   

  

**Om Sveaskog**
 Sveaskog är Sveriges största skogsägare och ägs av svenska staten. Bolaget äger 14 procent av Sveriges skogsmarker och har cirka 800 medarbetare runt om i landet. Våra kontor finns från Tärendö i norr till Osby i söder.

title: Project Manager Sustainability (SaaS)
description:
Are you ready to simplify sustainability reporting and drive impactful change? Do you enjoy diving into technical systems, solving complex challenges, and guiding customers to success? If this sounds like you, keep reading – we might have your next challenge! We are now looking for a Project Manager to join our Sustainability team in either Gothenburg or Stockholm.
 



 At Stratsys, we offer a SaaS platform that streamlines compliance in business-critical areas such as ESG (Environmental, Social & Governance), GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance), Strategic and Quality work. Unlike other compliance tools, we go a step further by moving organizations from reporting to action and effectively distributing responsibility internally. Our ESG tools are designed to streamline processes and empowering customers to efficiently align with directives such as CSRD/ESRS and CSDDD.
 



 In this role, your focus will be to onboard ESG customers, train them in using our platform, and configure the solutions tailored to their needs. You will play a key part in ensuring customers adopt and fully utilize our tools, enabling them to streamline their sustainability efforts. Who said compliance can’t be fun?
 



  





**WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? 💡** 



* You will be a part of a high-energy and collaborative culture where colleagues become friends. Take a look at our Instagram to get an insight into our culture
* Work from a fantastic and central office in one of Hötorgsskraporna in Stockholm or at Kungsportplatsen in Gothenburg.
* Maximum wellness allowance of SEK 5,000 and a company that encourages exercise and movement
* Work in a really important area with significant potential and strong market demand. The sustainability field is a growth area for us where you will have fast-paced working days with a lot of varied tasks.
* Join a company with great benefits – read more about our benefits here!



  





**About The Role 📌** 




 As a Project Manager in our Sustainability team your main responsibility is to help customers onboard and use our ESG solutions. You will work closely with a wide range of stakeholders. You will primarily work towards the private sector and our customers are mainly larger organizations where your contact areas span between people at the management and operational level. Your goal is to make sure customers understand the key features of the product so they can work independently and see the value it brings to their organization.
 



  





**Amongst other tasks - the responsibilities include;** 



* Leading onboarding projects for new and existing customers.
* Independently conduct product training for customers, both online and in person, to help customers master the product.
* Configuring the product to match customer needs and processes. This involves hands-on work in our platform, so you’ll need to be comfortable with technical systems and enjoy solving logical challenges.
* Consult the customer on how the products best fit with their processes and how to get full value out of the products.
* Lead and motivate the customer's project team through the implementation.
* Capture and follow up on the customer's further needs within our product offering to contribute to additional sales with our customers.
* Collaborating with internal teams like Customer Success to ensure the best possible outcome for the customer.



  





**YOUR BACKGROUND ✔️** 



* A university degree in Business Administration, Systems Science, Sustainability Management, Strategic Procurement, or a similar field.
* Fluency in Swedish and good knowledge of English ( a bonus with Norwegian).
* Some experience in customer-facing roles, such as sales, project management, system implementation, or similar positions.
* A genuine interest in sustainability.



  





**Nice-to-haves** 



* Previous experience working in a SaaS company or with digital systems.
* You have previous experience in the field of sustainability.
* You have experience in supplier assessment.
* You have experience working with CSRD, GHG, and ESG factors.



  





**About You 👀** 




 You’re eager to grow in the sustainability field and enjoy working closely with customers to help them succeed. You thrive in a fast-paced environment where problem-solving and guiding customers through new processes are key parts of your role.
 



 Pragmatic and solution-oriented, you take ownership of your work and enjoy collaborating with others to achieve shared goals. Your positive attitude, customer focus, and interest in helping organizations make the most of digital tools will make you a great fit for this role.
 



  





**About Us 🚀** 




 Does this look like a role for you? Do not hesitate, show your interest today since we are working ongoing with selection of candidates.
 



 Is this particular role not quite right for you - Show your interest for future openings by connecting with us. We look forward to hearing from you!
 



 Do you want to read more about us and your future colleagues and take part in our everyday life here at Stratsys? Go to jobs.stratsys.com or follow us on LinkedIn, Instagram or Facebook.

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

 As a SDR, you will contribute by generating new business by qualifying leads and driving various outbound campaigns. You will also focus on the development of each qualified lead to pass to your team of Account Executives and Relationship Managers. As an SDR you will learn and understand the key fundamentals of successful SaaS sales.
   

  

 We are looking for a colleague with high energy, an entrepreneurial tempo, and the ability to work closely with our marketing and product colleagues, with a strong focus on business opportunities and sales. The ideal candidate is someone who can start relationships with some of the largest companies in the world - and move them from being loving Mentimeter users to large Enterprise customers.
   

  

 We believe that a brilliant person with the right ambition can really leverage their time at Mentimeter. We are growing fast, and with us, so can you. Most importantly, we are looking for a candidate who is eager to develop Mentimeter as a company to a world-leading position. You will be one of the leading individuals making this happen.
   

  

**Responsibilities For The Role**
* Qualify leads based on our user, presenter and customer databases
* Deal with enterprises on a global level with customers in more than 220 countries
* Present and hand-over qualified leads to Account Executives and Relationship Managers
* Continuously improve the processes, analysis, and tactics used by Mentimeter Sales


**Resources We Have To Support You**
* Many (200+ million) users, presenters and customers who love Mentimeter (we have a NPS of above 70)
* Professional CRM and data gathering services (Salesforce, Mixpanel, Google Analytics, Intercom etc.) for advanced analytics and segmentation
* World-class lead-generation from the Marketing and Product teams
* Marketing and Sales teams to support in analysis and tactics
* Mentimeter principles / ways-of-working


**Must Haves For The Role**
* Minimum 1+ year experience working in a customer facing role.
* Exceptional communication skills, capable of effectively articulating ideas and engaging in meaningful dialogue with prospective clients
* Ability to analyze and assess business opportunities using data for informative decision making
* An entrepreneur in spirit, as you will be part of building Mentimeter as a company together with all your colleagues
* Ambitious and a strong drive to reach- and exceed targets
* Flexible mindset and open to new ways of working
* You are required to have professional-level English - we sell to more than 220 countries globally today


**It's a Bonus If You Have**
* Fluent in either German, Spanish or French is considered a plus
* Experience as a Customer Support Representative is considered a plus
* Experience in selling SaaS solutions
* Bachelor or masters degree (field not important)


**Not Required**
* You don’t have to know Swedish (we are an English-first organization, daily work is carried out in English and the Mentimeter team currently boasts over 45 different nationalities!)


**Compensation Model**
 We strongly believe in the power of togetherness, and we put a lot of effort into collaboration, teamwork and helping each other whenever needed. We believe that every part of Mentimeter, from Sales Development Representatives and Account Executives to Frontend Developers and Marketing Managers contributes equally to our continued success. To foster and emphasize this culture and way of working, we apply a non-commission based salary model in our sales roles, which has proven to be very successful and appreciated across the team.
   

  

**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 You can read about our benefits and perks here.
   

  

 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Copywriter & Social Media Specialist 🌟 (German speaking)
description:
Anyfin is on a mission to improve people’s financial lives. Taking out a loan is easier than ever – paying it back is the hard part. We simplify repayments by lowering loan costs and giving people more control over their financial future. And now, we’re looking for a native German-speaking Copywriter to our office in Stockholm, to drive our presence in Germany and make sure our brand is impossible to ignore.
   

  

 This is a rare opportunity to own and shape Anyfin’s voice in a key market. You’ll be the go-to person for all things content and organic social media in Germany, balancing creativity with data-driven execution. You will be a part of the creative team at Anyfin and report to our Creative Director.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 You’ll take full ownership of Anyfin’s tone of voice in Germany, ensuring it’s engaging, distinctive, and aligned with our brand strategy. Creating high-performing content for social media, web, emails, and ads will be a key part of your role, as well as managing and growing our social media presence. You’ll stay ahead of trends, bring fresh ideas to the table, and collaborate closely with designers, marketers, and product teams to deliver a seamless brand experience.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re a
 **native German speaker** 
 with a sharp instinct for language and messaging. Social media is second nature to you, and you understand what makes content resonate across different platforms. You thrive on creativity, love coming up with strong ideas, and enjoy seeing them come to life. Ambitious and proactive, you’re not just looking for any job – you want to take ownership, make an impact, and grow fast. If you have experience in copywriting, social media, or content creation, that’s a plus, but above all, we value talent, drive, and a strong work ethic.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 This is your chance to define and lead Anyfin’s voice in Germany. You’ll be part of a fast-moving, high-energy environment where you’ll have real responsibility from day one. We’re a supportive, ambitious, and ego-free team that works hard but also knows how to have fun. And most importantly, you’ll be joining a growing fintech that’s making a real difference in people’s lives.
   

  

 Please note that we do not offer relocation support for candidates applying from abroad.
   

  

 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to reduce the costs of high-interest loans, get a detailed overview of their fixed costs, and see their credit score.

title: Thesis Project at Sandvik

description:
Are you excited to shape the innovations of tomorrow? Then we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 We’re looking for bachelors, masters or higher vocational education workers for our sites in Sandviken, Gimo, Stockholm, and Svedala in Sweden. We offer you versatile tasks in a modern and continuously evolving international environment – a great opportunity for building strong networks and for your personal and professional development!

 We want to show how interesting and versatile a global company can be and want to give you a glimpse of what it’s like to work with top products and exceptional professionals in the manufacturing industry. title: Cloud- och Infrastrukturspecialist
description:
Vi söker nu en erfaren Cloud- och Infrastrukturspecialist för ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder inom finanssektorn. Som specialist kommer du att underhålla moderna molnlösningar.

**Primära arbetsuppgifter och ansvar**
--------------------------------------

* Designa, implementera och underhålla molnbaserade infrastrukturlösningar primärt i Azure och AWS
* Ansvara för migrering av befintliga system till molnplattformar enligt best practices
* Utveckla och underhålla infrastruktur som kod (IaC) med verktyg som Terraform, ARM-templates eller CloudFormation
* Implementera säkra och skalbara molnlösningar samt övervaka prestanda och tillgänglighet
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa en optimal integrering mellan infrastruktur och applikationer
* Utveckla och dokumentera tekniska processer och rutiner för molnmiljön

**Vad vi söker**
----------------

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete med molnplattformar, främst Azure och/eller AWS
* Gedigen kunskap om serverless-teknologier, containerisering med Docker och Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av automatisering och Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med Terraform eller liknande verktyg
* God förståelse för nätverk, säkerhet och identity management i molnmiljöer
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-processer
* Förmåga att kommunicera tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt och pedagogiskt sätt
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt

**Meriterande erfarenheter**
----------------------------

* Certifieringar inom Azure (AZ-104, AZ-305) eller AWS (Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer)
* Erfarenhet av hybridmiljöer och integration mellan lokala datacenter och molntjänster
* Kunskap om monitoreringsverktyg som Prometheus, Grafana eller Azure Monitor
* Erfarenhet av Python, PowerShell eller Bash för automation
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att implementera säkerhetsramverk och efterlevnad av regulatoriska krav

**Förmåner och utvecklingsmöjligheter på Liminity**
---------------------------------------------------

* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter och certifieringar
* Konkurrenskraftiga löner och attraktiva förmåner
* Läs mer om oss och våra erbjudanden i vår handbok

Känns detta som rätt utmaning för dig? Ansök nu och bli en del av Liminity - framtidens IT-konsultbolag!

title: Vi söker vår nästa Teamchef inom Cloud (GCP/Azure)
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
Vi söker dig som är en erfaren mjukvaruutvecklare och molnarkitekt **inom GCP** eller **Azure** med en passion för att bygga framtidssäkra lösningar och inspirera andra. I rollen kombinerar du arbete som konsult med en roll som teamchef, en roll där du hjälper både kunder och kollegor att bli framgångsrika. Cirka 20% av din tid roll innefattar att växa, inspirera och utveckla ditt team och verksamheten i södra Sverige tillsammans med övriga individer i den lokala ledningsgruppen. Resterande tid möjliggör du våra kunder att bli lyckosamma i sina molntransformationer på olika sätt! En roll för en multikonstnär med starkt självledarskap och erfarenhet av att leda team och leveranser.


**Forefront:**

Sedan 2008 har vi vuxit till över 550 kollegor med en mångfald av erfarenheter och kompetens inom managementkonsulting, design och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi finns på 11 kontor i Sverige och sedan 2024, även i USA.


Vi strävar efter att bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats genom att uppskatta våra olikheter, ständigt blicka framåt och skapa en organisation som är lika modig som klok. Vår övertygelse är att tekniken ger oss oanade möjligheter – för att utveckla människor, skapa bättre affärer och bygga hållbara samhällen.


Vi drivs av att förena människa och teknik och med gemensamma visioner och större ambitioner, stödjer vi en bred kundkrets på deras digitaliseringsresor. Genom våra nära partnerskap med Google och Microsoft ligger vi i teknisk framkant och erbjuder utmärkta förutsättningar för att hjälpa våra kunder med deras digitaliseringsprojekt.


**Dina ansvarsområden:**

* Designa och implementera skalbara, distribuerade och kvalitativa system som drar nytta av PaaS-tjänster och de unika fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure. För att prata klarspråk, du hjälper och möjliggör kunder bli lyckosamma i deras nyttjande av en plattform under olika delar av en molntransformation.
* Säkerställa att våra kunder får rätt lösningar för just deras situation genom att dra nytta av din och vår insyn i Google och Microsofts tekniska utveckling.
* Vara en möjliggörare som bygger vidare på ett erfaret team och stöttar nya förmågor, exempelvis inom vårt traineeprogram.
* Bidra till affärsutveckling och rekrytering i Region Syd (Malmö, Halmstad, Växjö).
* Delta i den operativa ledningsgruppen för regionen och bidra till våra strategiska mål.

**Vi letar efter dig som:**

* Har erfarenhet av att bygga moderna, komplexa och distribuerade system med fokus på kvalitet, prestanda och skalbarhet.
* Har djup erfarenhet av att nyttja PaaS-tjänster och designa lösningar som optimerar fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure.
* Vill ligga i teknisk framkant och använda vår nära relation och partnerskap med Google och Microsoft för att skapa innovativa lösningar.
* Är konsultmässig, och därmed nyfiken, positiv, modig, pragmatisk, flexibel, framåtlutad, samt trivs i framåtlutade produktorganisationer. Har ledarerfarenhet eller en stark vilja att utvecklas inom ledarskap.
* Kommunicerar väl på svenska och engelska, sprider energi och skapar trivsel omkring dig.

Kvalifikationer
**Vi erbjuder:**


* Möjligheten att forma kultur och gemenskap i en växande region.
* Stark vidareutveckling av dina nuvarande förmågor inom teknik, affär och ledarskap
* Tillgång till tekniska insikter och innovation genom våra partnerskap med Google och Microsoft.
* Stöd i din personliga och professionella utveckling, med tillgång till coaching, utbildningar och nätverk.
* Flexibla arbetstider och fokus på work-life balance.
* En arbetsplats där vi stöttar, firar och utvecklar varandra.
* En kombination av fast lön och resultatbaserad ersättning.
Vi är ett stöttande, varmt och framåtsträvande team som tror på att göra riktiga avtryck – både för våra kunder och varandra. Är du vår nästa ledare och kollega?

Om företaget
Forefront Consulting är ett verksamhets- och IT-konsultbolag med drygt 550 anställda. Med kontor på 11 orter i Sverige och USA, guidar vi företag och organisationer i det digitala landskapet och övriga transformationer.



Oavsett om uppdraget avser affärsverksamhet, teknologiska plattformar eller designlösningar är utgångspunkten alltid att först skapa en samsyn kring nödvändiga förändringar för att sedan kunna realisera dessa på bästa sätt för avsedd effekt.


.Våra värderingar är vårt DNA


AvsiktAvsikten är motorn i vårt arbete och medvetenheten om var målet ligger. Den ger oss styrkan att ifrågasätta det till synes uppenbara, lägger kraft bakom våra påståenden och motiverar våra beslut.


AvtryckAvtryck säger något om vår starka ambition att skapa förändring. Att göra verklig skillnad. Både i aktuella kundprojekt och i vår omvärld i stort. Vi är stolta över att våra kunder talar väl om oss. Och vi blir glada när vår verksamhet ses som en positiv förebild av kollegorna i branschen.


InsiktDet är i insikten som vårt arbete börjar. För att nå dit krävs tålamod, empati och ödmjukhet, samt nyfikenhet nog att kunna ta in flera olika perspektiv och väga samman informationen. Insikt handlar om att verkligen förstå problemet innan vi försöker lösa det.


TillsammansTillsammans är den väg vi väljer för att nå de mål vi siktar mot. Ordet ger uttryck för vårt sökande efter mervärdet i en gemensam strävan. Det handlar om att befinna sig jämsides med kunder och kollegor. Utan prestige och onödiga hierarkier, men med delaktighet, ansvar och arbetsglädje.


UtsiktUtsikt beskriver både en position och den medvetna ansträngning som är nödvändig för att ta sig dit. Begreppet påminner oss också om att goda rådgivare är öppna och ödmjuka. Det handlar om att se och att särskilja, med fokus på kundens affärsnytta.


Om företaget
Forefront Consulting är ett verksamhets- och IT-konsultbolag med drygt 550 anställda. Med kontor på 11 orter i Sverige och USA, guidar vi företag och organisationer i det digitala landskapet och övriga transformationer.



Oavsett om uppdraget avser affärsverksamhet, teknologiska plattformar eller designlösningar är utgångspunkten alltid att först skapa en samsyn kring nödvändiga förändringar för att sedan kunna realisera dessa på bästa sätt för avsedd effekt.
